bill.title: Economic development; create Statutory Momentum Mississippi Board to advise Mississippi Development Authority.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 57-63-1, 57-63-3, 57-63-9, 57-63-11, 57-63-13, 57-63-15, 57-63-17, 57-63-19, 57-63-21, 57-63-23, 57-63-25, 57-63-27, 57-63-29, 57-63-33 And 57-63-37, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Institutionalize The Government-private Sector Partnership Of The Momentum Mississippi Board For Purposes Essential To Improving And Promoting The Health And General Welfare Of The People Of The State Of Mississippi Through Sustainable Economic Development; To Amend Section 57-1-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Momentum Mississippi Board To Submit To The Governor Candidates For The Position Of Executive Director Of The Mississippi Development Authority; To Repeal Section 57-63-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For Certain Reports Pertaining To Local Governments; And For Related Purposes.
